description:
Vovsoft File Checksum Calculator is a standalone utility that generates and verifies cryptographic hashes in CRC-32, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512.

Vovsoft File Checksum Calculator is a standalone utility that generates and verifies cryptographic hashes in CRC-32, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512. The software supports lowercase and uppercase letters for displaying and validation, based on user selection.

File Checksum Calculator has the installer option of "Add context menu item". The Right Click Menu or the Context Menu is the menu, which appears when you right-click on any file in Windows. By clicking the context menu shortcut, you can easily calculate the checksum of any file.
